thread.title: Assault attempt at Rahul Easwer
thread.title_full: Assault attempt at Rahul Easwer - The Times of India

author: Asha Prakash
title: Assault attempt at Rahul Easwer
text:
Anchor and activist Rahul Easwer was attacked at Allapuzha, where he visited a college as a guest speaker.
During his speech, Rahul did not comment on the beef festival conducted by SFI and KSU students in various colleges in the state. Following the speech, Rahul was walking towards his car when a group of students charged at him, shouting slogans, and broke the windows of his car. Rahul was uninjured, but later tweeted: "I am shocked and scared...can one not live in Kerala without supporting Beef Festival??" Another tweet with a photo of his damaged car read: "Attack on me & Car got smashed...raising slogans for Beef Festival in Kerala. DYSP Police registers FIR."
